param.name: gmap_base_tld
param.label: Google Maps Base TLD
param.description: The two-letter country code top-level domain used to bias the geocoder's results. See http://www.iana.org/domains/root/db/index.html

param.name: debug_mode
param.label: Debug Mode?
param.description: Adds debugging output (DO NOT USE IN PRODUCTION!)

param.name: google_analytics
param.label: Integrate with Google Analytics
param.description: Tracks clicks and views of locations & searches in your Google Analytics account. You must have Google Analytics tracking code installed on your site.

param.name: skip_geocoded
param.label: Exclude Geocoded locations on bulk geocoder?

param.name: use_address_1
param.label: Use Address field on bulk geocoder?

param.name: use_address_2
param.label: Use Address 2 field on bulk geocoder?

param.name: use_city
param.label: Use city field on bulk geocoder?

param.name: use_state
param.label: Use state field on bulk geocoder?

param.name: use_postalcode
param.label: Use postalcode field on bulk geocoder?

param.name: use_country
param.label: Use country field on bulk geocoder?

param.name: use_jquery
param.label: Use jQuery for Ajax?
param.description: This option will use the jQuery javascript library instead of the default MooTools. Note: Menu-item DOM Hook settings are ignored if this is set to Yes. (jQuery.ready() event is used)

param.name: admin_template
param.label: Admin Item address format
param.description: The format of the address. Fields are lowercase and in curly brackets. HTML Tags are in square brackets, (E.g. [br][p][/p]) Items with a [br] tag directly after them (no spaces) that are blank will also omit the the [br] tag
